name: Who The Fuck Gave Alice A Minigun?!?!?!?
name_original: Who The Fuck Gave Alice A Minigun?!?!?!?
description:
Lil pony in a shopping cart with a minigun, what she will buy? :)

There's no game, you can shoot but not much else. Just showing off what i did today. I maaaaaay do something with this in the future idk

Hold click to shoot

A and D to move

Alf+F4 to close
